title: Allow setting of HTTP headers on SolrCloud subrequests
description:
I'd like to request the support for the setting of HTTP headers on SolrCloud sub-requests (super-requests that result in an internal sub-request in SolrCloud).

I would like to be able to set an HTTP header in 2 ways:

	Copy headers (a specific list?) from super-request -> sub-request. (default behavior)
	Provide a sub-request HTTP header as a JVM param or in solr.xml. (failback from default behavior)



This would also help resolve SOLR-4470 in a more agnostic (any HTTP header) way.
